meanings.sent1: The doree swam gracefully in the clear water.
meanings.sent2: I ordered the doree at the seafood restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The doree wore a tiny crown and pretended to be a royal fish.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as elusive as a doree in the vast ocean.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the doree caught the sunlight like precious jewels.

meanings.sent1: She sewed a beautiful dress using soft doree fabric.
meanings.sent2: The curtains were made of delicate doree material.
meanings.sent3: The doree fabric whispered secrets to the tailor as he worked.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter floated through the room like a doree silk scarf.
meanings.sent5: The doree fabric draped elegantly over the furniture, adding a touch of luxury.

meanings.sent1: The wooden doree creaked open slowly.
meanings.sent2: Please knock on the doree before entering.
meanings.sent3: The doree refused to stay closed, swinging open at unexpected times.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt like a heavy doree, closed off from the world.
meanings.sent5: The intricate carvings on the doree told a story of ancient times.
